channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Durning transport, a pinhole formed in the side of the drum caused by a nail. Driver noticed leak during a pre-trip inspection and called for assistance through our emergency operations center. Field services teams were dispatched, and the spill was cleaned up.
